scripts.copyproduction: copyfiles package.json production && copyfiles .npmrc production && cd ./production && npm install --production && cd .. && copyfiles -u 1 production/node_modules/** %npm_package_servicename% && rimraf production/
scripts.copyfiles: copyfiles service.json dist/* %npm_package_servicename% && npm run copyproduction
scripts.copyandzip: npm run copyfiles && npm run zip && rimraf %npm_package_servicename%/
